pageContext.claim: “I was with President Xi, who I have a very good relationship with, I said: Do me a favor. Would you allow cattle, please, to come in? I was last night in West Virginia, and I had farmers coming up to me and hugging me and kissing me because of the cattle stuff.”
pageContext.analysis: China had already agreed to allow the sale of U.S. beef under a deal brokered by the Obama administration. The only thing new was that a definite date was set for when sales would begin.
